snippet: The Pocket-eAzl is an aluminum and rubber stand that folds to a small size but can be adjusted to hold most readers, pads and phones upright.
abstract: The Pocket-eAzl is an aluminum and rubber stand that folds to a small size but can be adjusted to hold most readers, pads and phones upright.

headline.main: A Stand That Isn't Pretty, but Practical
headline.print_headline: A Tablet Accessory More Practical Than Pretty
